name: FormBuilder Pro
description: Advanced form builder with PDF conversion, interactive drag-drop editing, Stripe/PayPal payments, SendGrid email integration, digital signatures, and enterprise document management.
author: {{USER_NAME}}

integrations.stripe: Payment processing with cards and ACH
integrations.interact_js: Drag and drop form element positioning
integrations.pdf_lib: PDF parsing and form field conversion

requirements.stripe_keys: Publishable and secret key required for payments
requirements.paypal_credentials: Client ID and secret for PayPal integration
requirements.sendgrid_api: API key required for email functionality
